title: William and Kate tour LIVE: Duke and Duchess of Cambridge visit Pakistan on royal trip
text:
Today is the first day of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge's royal tour of Pakistan.

The royal couple arrived in the country last night and have a busy schedule for the next four days, before flying home on Friday.

William and Kate are due to visit a local school today before heading into the Himalayan foothills.

They will also meet with Pakistan's President, Arif Alvi, and Prime Minister, Imran Khan, who was educated in the UK.

The royals are expected to attend a formal event this evening.

Follow below for live updates
description: The royal couple arrived in the country last night and have a busy schedule for the next four days
